verses.roman:
ujjvala madhura prema-bhakti sei pāya
ānande kṛṣṇa-mādhurye vihare sadāya

synonyms: ujjvala—illuminated; madhura—sweet; prema-bhakti—ecstatic love of Kṛṣṇa; sei—he; pāya—gets; ānande—in transcendental bliss; kṛṣṇa-mādhurye—the sweetness of Kṛṣṇa's pastimes; vihare—enjoys; sadāya—always.
translation: "Tasting the transcendental, effulgent, sweetly ecstatic love of Kṛṣṇa, such a person can enjoy life twenty-four hours a day in the transcendental bIiss of the sweetness of Kṛṣṇa's pastimes.
